meanings.definition: A type of insect with hard forewings that meet in a straight line down the back when closed.
meanings.sent1: The beetles crawled on the ground.
meanings.sent2: I saw colorful beetles in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The beetles had a race on the leaf.
meanings.sent4: The beetles marched in a straight line like tiny soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The shiny beetles shimmered under the sun.

meanings.sent1: She beetles towards the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The children beetles to the playground.
meanings.sent3: The puppy beetles after the bouncing ball.
meanings.sent4: Time beetles forward, never looking back.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel beetles up the tree with excitement.
